oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Benjamin E. Carmichael correspondence with Raymond B. Witt, 1967 January 10
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Carmichael, Benjamin E.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from Benjamin Carmichael, former superintendent of Chattanooga Public Schools, to Raymond Witt commending him on his handling of the Mapp v. Board of Education of Chattanooga case.

Chattanooga Board of Education records and correspondence, 1965-1969
